text: Fanny Brice (October 29, 1891 â€“ May 29, 1951) was an American singer, comedian, theater and movie actress. She appeared in many Broadway plays. She also appeared on television and radio. On radio, she played Snooks in The Baby Snooks Show. In the movie Everybody Sing, she played Olga. Brice was born in New York City. She died in Hollywood, California from a cerebral hemorrhage. She was 59. ==References== Category:Actors from New York City Category:American movie actors Category:American radio actors Category:American stage actors Category:American television actors Category:Comedians from New York City Category:Deaths from cerebral hemorrhage Category:1891 births Category:1951 deaths
title: Fanny Brice
